_sText:
After several failed attempts to reach Stryker who made this map originally in 2005 as a remake of ice-world.

I decided to update it myself. My friend =EZ= made the radar overview. The auto-generated nav file that was with the game allowed the bots to spawn behind the weapons , and from there they would go single file up the middle with just a pistol or go up the steps and let you fight the other team alone. I redirected the bots over the weapons to even up the sides. 

I believe everyone has probably seen this map before. Since the only things we added to it was the radar and a place-painted nav file that is what the screen shots are of.

Don't forget there is a buy-zone in the middle highlighted by my cross-hair on the nav screen. Part of the reason I did this is that the original funtimes is no longer on the banana. That just didn't seem right.
